title: Music
description: A red hot new romance about young love and following your heart, no matter what anyone tells you.Charlotte is young, white, privileged and a talented cellist: good enough to attend the world-renowned Farrington Academy for the Performing Arts in New York. She's also painfully, crushingly shy.Her life changes in an instant when she falls for Saul: a penniless up-and-coming black rapper from the Bronx. Everyone tells her it can't work: and she's too na√Øve to forsee the problems they'll face. Their backgrounds, their friends, their parents: everything is against them, and Charlotte isn't known for breaking the rules. But love fears no boundaries... This erotic romance includes adult scenes.
author: Tanya Korval
